title: Black Friday at Best Buy - here are the 9 best early deals
author: james-pickard
summary: Budget TVs, discounted iPhones, cheap earbuds and more
article: Hot off the heels of last week's selection of offers, an early Best Buy Black Friday deals event is now underway. It's yet another barrage of discounted tech, with TVs, headphones, laptops, cell phones, and more all reduced. And to assure you, the Black Friday Prices Guarantee still applies to anything in this sale, so the discount you see today won't be beaten at any point up to November 26.

If you don't want to go through the entire sale yourself, we've picked out a handful of the best deals below. They've been selected either because the discount offered is particularly high or it's a popular product we think many are looking for in this year's Black Friday deals.
To give you a quick idea, there's a 75-inch TCL 4K TV for $749.99 (was $899.99), the premium Apple AirPods Max for $479 (was $549), and a powerful Microsoft Surface Pro 7 for $649.99 (was $899.99).

The Best Buy early deals event stretches outside the obvious tech categories, too, where you can find a Bella Pro Series 4.2-qt. Air Fryer for just $29.99 (was $59.99) or even $500 off a Proform Pro 5000 treadmill.

Those are just a few of our favourites so far. No doubt we'll return to this page with any further standout bargains as the sale continues. Don't forget to visit and bookmark our bigger guide to all of this year's Best Buy deals should you want all the latest info as November 26 approaches.

headers.4: Black Friday deals at Best Buy - our top picks
